26
27#ifndef _CPACK_H
28#define _CPACK_H
29
30struct cpack_state {
31 const uint8_t *c_buf;
32 const uint8_t *c_next;
33 size_t c_len;
34};
35
36int cpack_init(struct cpack_state *, const uint8_t *, size_t);
37
38int cpack_uint8(struct cpack_state *, uint8_t *);
39int cpack_uint16(struct cpack_state *, uint16_t *);
40int cpack_uint32(struct cpack_state *, uint32_t *);
41int cpack_uint64(struct cpack_state *, uint64_t *);
42
43const uint8_t *cpack_next_boundary(const uint8_t *buf, const uint8_t *p, size_t alignment);
44const uint8_t *cpack_align_and_reserve(struct cpack_state *cs, size_t wordsize);
45
46#define cpack_int8(__s, __p) cpack_uint8((__s), (uint8_t*)(__p))
47#define cpack_int16(__s, __p) cpack_uint16((__s), (uint16_t*)(__p))
48#define cpack_int32(__s, __p) cpack_uint32((__s), (uint32_t*)(__p))
49#define cpack_int64(__s, __p) cpack_uint64((__s), (uint64_t*)(__p))
50
51extern int cpack_advance(struct cpack_state *, const size_t);
52
53#endif /* _CPACK_H */
54
